content: I think I understand the Eisenhower Matrix better now. I can see how it can help me prioritize my tasks more effectively. I'd like to apply this framework to my daily tasks, especially when it comes to balancing my work and personal life. Since my parents are both in their early 60s, I've been wanting to spend more quality time with them, but I haven't been able to due to my busy schedule. I think I can use the Eisenhower Matrix to prioritize my tasks and make time for them.
